description:
http://anidb.net/ch25712 [Ganossa Maximilian]`s assistant at the time of the "http://anidb.net/ch25784 [Project Gaia]". His full name Shiobara Souichirou is mentioned only in the manga.
During his attack against http://anidb.net/ch25713 [Gigelf Liqueur] he apparently transforms into a http://anidb.net/ch25718 [Lucifer Hawk].
name: Shiobara
